title: Why you bully me
author: Why you bully me
content: As we will most likely continue to see bear market for this year, what are you stacking up on and why? I would love to know so I can see what people are interested and there reasoning for it..

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Why you bully me on January 13, 2023, 09:05:57 AMAs we will most likely continue to see bear market for this year, what are you stacking up on and why? I would love to know so I can see what people are interested and there reasoning for it.. Im stacking up on bitcoin and some few altcoins such as avalanche, fantom and this new evm evmos. I love staking and farming and I am keep staking on those projects.On fantom there are good farming projects like spiritswap with tons of pairing and even rewards for voting. Evmos has a good daily rewards and avalanche a normal L1 with a lot of improvements such as subnets. There are other choices but it will depend on what you like.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Matic has been growing even in the bear market which is why I am trying to grab more of it because there are also companies adopting the Polygon chain. There are others that I have bought but it's the Matic that I have been staking up among the altcoins. Jsut buying every time it dips back below 0.80 as I'm still unsure if I have to grab a ton of it since this slight jump in BTC price might just be a bull trap again as it always did in the past.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: If we are not going to talk about BTC (because altcoin section) then ETH and BNB, not that I do not have anything else, I have a small amount in other things as well but those two are what I keep rebuying more and more. I am going to end up with as much of them as I could possibly have, not that I am going to stop anytime soon. It means that every time I get my salary, I am going to spend a little bit of it on buying eth and bnb, right now at 50-50% situation but I will get some more ETH later on during the summer when I will get rid of all my debt (which is almost over) and can spare more money. I understand people who buy smaller cap stuff, but this is what I prefer.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: I am mostly focusing on POW. Mostly BTC and Dogecoin. I am tired of reading about the centralized POS coin scams. POW coins are what originally decentralization on the blockchain was all about. POS is a threat to decentralization and I can not support it.You can't try to avoid centralized banks and systems only to buy and HODL a shitcoin that is centralized.

comments.body: it is obviously BTC, ETH and BNB it just seems no brainer in stacking up and bag holding this coin at the moment, the other coins mostly still uncertain about their future, even solana like now either it's gonna go up really high or it just gonna go down it just seemed unsafe investment investing in newer coins around bearish but once bullrush signs is already showing i'm sure stacking up on some of these newest alts gonna make more sense.i'd say always prioritize investing in coin that's already considered good quality yet already losing good share of its value that way it will be more worth it and more prospecting for your investments in the upcoming bullruns.

comments.body: Almost all of my tokens were growing up again. I never stack bitcoin but i have been stacking up some tokens like GALA, LAND and many more. Glad to see that bitcoin has been making comeback instantly and it has surpassed 20k again. It seems like that huge recovery in the economic of some biggest countries have been decreasing the fear to put money in the crypto. Crypto has become a new trend right now. Bitcoin will have another halving to come and this is also pushing the price to go even higher than before. I hope that bitcoin will be going back again at 60k as average price. that's gonna be so good to see that my portfolios will be increasing multiple times again. Bitcoin can do that.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Only BTC, FUN and ETH right now, and I'm willing to retreat from staking, fearing the recent events involving the scams in crypto industry. Now that crypto market is becoming interesting again, I'm not feeling confident in letting my coins in third party platforms. Greedy scammers are everywhere, especially at the command of exchanges, so we must be careful, as once they see the market pumping I don't know what might pass through their minds, but something like taking advantage of users' funds for more profit is not only possible, as also likely.

So maybe we will not see that huge profit in 2024/25, but I'm going to take that risk.No meme or shit coins for me, so besides, ETH, I'm also deep on BNB as well. Good to have this altcoin as well to be some hedge in my portfolio as it could really be valuable as well in the future.
